message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit too steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $80 for it. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand your concern about the price, but I'm still a bit far from your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $160.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my offer of $80. Let's see if we can find a compromise.
Hi Bob, I understand you're still not willing to go above $80, but I'm willing to make a small adjustment. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $140.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still only comfortable paying $80.  I'm not sure if we can find a middle ground, but I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I understand you're still stuck on $80, but I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $130.
Alice, I'm really trying to be fair here, but $130 is still above my budget. I'm going to stick to my offer of $80,  this is the most I'm willing to pay.
Hi Bob, I understand you're really close to your budget, but I'm not willing to go below $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $80 and $120, so I'm offering the product to you for $100.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $100, but it's still a bit higher than what I'm comfortable with. I'm going to stick with my original offer of $80. It's my final offer.
